inclusion.criterion: Patients without Brugada syndrome acting as a control group
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patients undergoing ablation with ECGi system for other arrhythmias
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patient with AF undergoing ablation with ECGi system
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Pregnancy or not using a highly effective form of contraception
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: 65 yo man with history of CAD and prior MI, HLD, HTN, ventricular tachycardia, and syncope. Recently discharged after a negative work-up for syncope which included the implantation of a cardiac monitoring device.
